i1.name: Contempt for the Weak
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Zed's''' [[basic attack]]s against targets {{sti|health|{{as|below 50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}} deal {{as|{{pp|key=%|6 to 10 for 3|1;7;17}} of the target's '''maximum''' health}} as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. Against {{tip|monster|monsters}}, the damage is increased by 100%, but is capped at {{pp|200 to 500 for 3|1;7;17}}.
''Contempt for the Weak'' can only affect the same target once every few seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% of their maximum health deal 1;7;17 ‒ undefined of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage. Against monsters, the damage is increased by 100%, but is capped at 1;7;17 ‒ undefined.
Contempt for the Weak can only affect the same target once every few seconds.
i1.notes:
* The enhanced attack applies other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but does not affect [[structures]].
* ''Contempt for the Weak'' is not consumed when {{tip|dodged}} or {{tip|blind|missed}}, but it is consumed when {{tip|blocked}}.
* ''Contempt for the Weak'' considers the target's health upon landing the attack, not when it's declared.
** If the target falls below the threshold while '''Zed''' is winding up the attack, ''Contempt for the Weak'' applies, and vice versa.

q1.name: Razor Shuriken
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' throw their spinning blades toward the target location. Each blade deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck, reduced to 60% against units beyond the first.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Zed and his File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadows throw their spinning blades toward the target location. Each blade deals physical damage to all enemies struck, reduced to 60% against units beyond the first.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 220}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Secondary Damage|{{ap|80*0.6 to 220*0.6}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Razor Shuriken'' has been special cased to apply a stack of {{ri|Electrocute}} and {{ri|Phase Rush}} for each ''Shuriken'' hit.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} only blocks the damage from one ''Razor Shuriken'' even if two hit at the same time.
** ''Shurikens'' blocked by {{tip|spell shield}} still count as being hit for the reduced pass-through damage.
* If '''Zed''' buffers an attack command during ''Razor Shuriken's'' cast time the attack will perform slower than if '''Zed''' had attacked after the cast time.
** The same does not happen if '''Zed''' recasts {{ai|Living Shadow 2|Zed|Living Shadow}} during ''Razor Shuriken's'' cast time.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD)
  • Secondary Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD)

e1.name: Shadow Slash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' slash, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies surrounding them.

Enemies hit by the slash of a [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but the slow's potency is increased by 50%.
Each enemy {{tip|champion}} hit by '''Zed's''' slash reduces {{ai|Living Shadow|Zed|Living Shadow's}} {{sti|cooldown}} by 2 seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zed and his File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadows slash, dealing physical damage to enemies surrounding them.
Enemies hit by the slash of a File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadow are slowed for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but the slow's potency is increased by 50%.
Each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by 2 seconds.
e1.notes:
* ''Shadow Slash'' has been special cased to apply a stack of {{ri|Electrocute}} and {{ri|Phase Rush}} for each slash hit.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shield}} will only block one ''Shadow Slash'' even if two hit at the same time, the {{tip|slow}} will not apply regardless.
* ''Shadow Slash'' does not interrupt attack commands.
